body_html:
Hi @G-mel

Thank you for your comments

I have developed the segmentation based on mobilnetv2.

How could I edit train.py and eval.py to reflect you proposal.

Where should I add the training scope in train.py?

Your suggestion is very helpful

You see train.py and other source codes as below

https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/research/deeplab
